title: Omloop Het Nieuwsblad won't be broadcast on Eurosport or GCN
content:
Will Strickson
18 Feb 2021

Eurosport has confirmed that despite TV guides showing coverage on the network the race will not be shown

Bad news for fans of the Spring Classics hoping to watch the opening race from the UK as Eurosport and GCN are no longer set to broadcast Omloop Het Nieuwsblad later this month.

Despite multiple TV guides showing coverage for the first Cobbled Classic of the season beginning at 13:00, the unverified Eurosport Support Twitter account has tweeted in reply to a customer enquiry: 'I'm sorry to confirm that we will not be showing the Omloop Het Nieuwsblad race. However, will be showing the UAE Tour in the UK on E1.'

La Flamme Rouge also confirmed the race isn't listed the GCN app in any country.

While viewers of the UAE Tour and Ski Jumping World Championships may rejoice, potential TV rights issues with organiser Flanders Classics have been suggested as the reason for Omloop dropping off the schedules, and that could mean that coverage of Gent-Wevelgem, Dwars Door Vlaanderen, Scheldeprijs, De Brabantse Pijl and the Tour of Flanders may also be in jeopardy.

Eurosport has confirmed to Cyclist that Omloop will not be shown but did not elaborate as to why.
